item.title: Adding a custom login box and buttons [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Ive figured out how to fix the problem where it shows one button.

The part where you replace this:
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_967.method361

With this
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1292.method348

You have to do this for each button otherwise it uses the original method and loads the default runescape button.

Read full topic
